Key Match Events: Alexander Djiku scored for Ghana in the 56th minute with a header assisted by Jordan Ayew.
Jamiro Monteiro scored for Cape Verde in the 17th minute with a left-footed shot.
Garry Rodrigues scored the winning goal for Cape Verde in the 92nd minute with a right-footed shot assisted by Gilson Benchimol.
Garry Rodrigues received a yellow card for excessive celebration after his goal.
